title: NAACP isn’t inviting Trump to national convention, a first
shortDescription: NAACP won’t invite Trump or Vance to convention, breaking a 116-year tradition

title: 'Why would I call him?': Trump says he won't call Minnesota governor
shortDescription: Trump says he won’t call Gov. Tim Walz after Minnesota shootings, calls Walz a mess. 'Why would I call him?'

title: Trump urges evacuation of Tehran
shortDescription: "They should've done the deal." President Donald Trump called for the evacuation of Iran's capital of Tehran.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump's dire message to Iran
shortDescription: Trump urges everyone in Tehran to evacuate. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.

title: American Bar Association sues to block Trump's attacks on law firms
shortDescription: The ABA is seeking an order that would bar the White House from pursuing what it called a campaign of intimidation against major law firms.

title: The trickle-down effect of Trump's massive NIH budget cuts
shortDescription: U.S. medical research is at a precipice as President Trump proposes cutting $18 billion from the National Institutes of Health.

title: Trump cuts 'lone actor' terror prevention amid rising attacks
shortDescription: A DHS program that funds efforts to spot and report potential domestic terrorists is being shuttered by the Trump Administration, as attacks spike.

title: Trump looms over Virginia governor's race: What to know
shortDescription: November's winner will make history as the first female governor of Virginia: Abigail Spanberger for the Democrats or Winsome Earle-Sears for the GOP

title: Trump denies reaching out to Iran for Israel ceasefire
shortDescription: Trump said he was working toward something "much bigger" than a ceasefire, while chastising Iran for not accepting his nuclear deal.

title: Trump, Starmer say US-UK trade deal finalized
shortDescription: President Trump and British Prime Minister Keir Starmer announced they finalized a trade deal at the G7 Summit in Canada.

title: Tax tweaks, Medicaid cuts: What's in the Senate tax bill
shortDescription: The bill text released June 16 sets up a potentially explosive confrontation with House Republicans.

title: Iran urges Trump to 'muzzle' Israel in fourth day of air war
shortDescription: Israeli forces stepped up bombing of Iranian cities, while Iran pierced Israeli air defences with a successful volleys of retaliatory missile strikes.

title: Trump orders more ICE deportations in blue cities
shortDescription: President Trump ordered ICE to deliver "the single largest Mass Deportation Program in History" by expanding operations in cities led by Democrats.

title: ‘No Kings’ protests vastly outdraw Trump's military parade
shortDescription: A stark contrast emerged in attendance between the Trump administration’s Army birthday parade in Washington, DC, and the sweeping “No Kings” protests held nationwide.

title: Trump teases deals with Iran, Canada at G7 summit
shortDescription: President Trump started the 2025 G7 summit by taking questions from reporters, who asked about deals with Iran and Canada.

title: Trump Org unveils Trump Mobile cellular service
shortDescription: The Trump Organization unveiled Trump Mobile cellular service and 'T1' smartphone.

title: Donald, Melania and Army parade: Trump family members who attended
shortDescription: Donald Trump turned 79 June 14, 2025, the same day as the Army's 250th birthday parade in DC. Melania was there, but not all of Trump's children were.

title: 'They'd like to talk': Trump says Iran wants off-ramp in conflict
shortDescription: 'Iran is not winning this war, and they should talk, and they should talk immediately before it's too late,' Trump said at the G7 Summit in Canada.

title: Zelenskyy to press Trump on Ukraine weapons purchase at G7
shortDescription: Trump and Zelenskyy are expected to meet during a Group of Seven summit for advanced economies that's taking place in a remote area of Canada.

title: Majority of Americans think Trump admin should follow court orders
shortDescription: A majority of American adults believe the Trump administration should follow through with federal court orders, according to a new NBC News poll.
